item.title: Plugin Architectures in DotNet – Dev Leader Weekly 54
item.description: The post Plugin Architectures in DotNet – Dev Leader Weekly 54 appeared first on Dev Leader.Welcome to another issue of Dev Leader Weekly! In this issue, I plugin architecture in DotNet based on a presentation I did in Dallas! The post Plugin Architectures in DotNet – Dev Leader Weekly 54 appeared first on Dev Leader. Link to article: https://www.devleader.ca/2024/07/27/plugin-architectures-in-dotnet-dev-leader-weekly-54/
